item.title: Visualizing European WWI Defense Treaties with iGraph in R
item.description: *Migrated from my Word Press blog Network analysis and network visualization are two fascinating aspects of data science. Just about anything can be imagined as a network. The two basic requirements are: There should be a “distinct set of entities”, such as humans, organizations There should exist a known relationship between these entities (Zweig, 5). Network analysis is useful when it can reveal much about structure, relationships, or arrangements.
